speech: Yes, we offer a monthly stipend and a certificate of completion. Some roles also include mentorship and full-time offer opportunities.
Absolutely! We offer a monthly stipend, a certificate of completion, and in some cases, mentorship from industry experts. Outstanding interns may even receive full-time opportunities.
Interns receive a stipend for their contributions, along with a formal certificate upon successful completion. Select roles may also include guided mentorship and potential placement offers.
